title: cloud target
extract: Cloud Recognition. The Vuforia Cloud Recognition service is an enterprise class Image Recognition solution that enables developers to host and manage Image Targets online. ... Usage is determined by the total number of image recognitions, or “recos”, per month that your app performs, and is counted when a target is matched ...
extract_html: Cloud Recognition. The Vuforia Cloud Recognition service is an enterprise class Image Recognition solution that enables developers to host and manage Image Targets online. ... Usage is determined by the total number of image recognitions, or “recos”, per month that your app performs, and is counted when a target is matched ...
